item.title: An entity has recently been accumulating ETH in batches, holding over 100,000 coins in total, with a value of $363.58 million.
item.description: August 6th. Based on the monitoring of OnchainLens, in the past two days, 4 multi-sig wallets (belonging to the same entity) received 101,131 ETH, which is worth $3.6358 billion, from FalconX, Galaxy Digital, and BitGo.Addresses: 0x55cf01a87ba597ffa6772a0634c30ceec7fce6790x8c6bbdeffbe8fc7c58e920934667c5b74debdc600x86f911deb6bb8ca5c36eddf9ef86a9dc1f6944460xf2a030cd953b4dcad9563f5a1d58bb3342fea458

item.title: Yesterday FBTC net outflow was $99.1 million, GBTC net outflow was $19.7 million
item.description: On August 6th, as per farside monitoring, yesterday FBTC witnessed a net outflow of $99.10 million, and GBTC saw a net outflow of $19.70 million.

item.title: Jupiter Lend's Lending Protocol will be rolled out in stages, with private testing set to commence soon
item.description: On August 6th, Jupiter announced that the lending protocol Jupiter Lend will be launched in phases. It will begin with a private beta for waitlisted users starting from today. The official public launch version later this August will provide a Loan-to-Value ratio (LTV) of up to 95%, with close to zero liquidation penalties. There will be multiple vaults and generous Annual Percentage Yields (APY).

item.title: Yesterday Grayscale ETH saw a net outflow of $13.4 million, while ETHE had a net outflow of $10.9 million.
item.description: On August 6th, as per farside monitoring, the Grayscale ETH witnessed a net outflow of $13.4 million yesterday. ETHE had a net outflow of $10.9 million. CETH had a net inflow of $3.6 million. And ETHV had a net inflow of $5.2 million.

item.title: Yesterday's GBTC Net Outflow: $19.7M
item.description: August 6th. Based on farside monitoring, the net outflow of GBTC yesterday was $19.7 million.

item.title: CZ Requests Bankruptcy Court to Dismiss $1.76B Lawsuit Filed by FTX Trust
item.description: On August 6th, CZ has emerged as the latest Binance figure to petition the bankruptcy court to dismiss FTX's trust accusation. The trust aimed to reclaim $1.76 billion that was inappropriately transferred by Sam Bankman-Fried (SBF). CZ submitted a motion in the Delaware bankruptcy court this Monday, claiming that FTX Trust and FTX Digital Markets Ltd. were unable to prove that he has a "domicile" in Delaware as he is a resident of the UAE and not under the jurisdiction of the state.In the filing, CZ stated: "These accusations have little to do with Delaware or even the U.S. mainland, and the relevant laws do not possess extraterritorial effects, thus they are simply not applicable."As early as November 2024, FTX Trust and FTX Digital Markets had previously sued Binance and its executives in relation to the July 2021 SBF share buyback agreement. In July of this year, two former Binance executives, Samuel Wenjun Lim and Xiao Dinghua, also requested the court to remove themselves from

item.title: A Whale Increases Ethereum Short Position to 70,000 ETH, Liquidation Price at $3,686
item.description: On August 6th, based on the monitoring of @EmberCN, the [Four-time ETH 75% Win Rate Whale] continued to be engaged in shorting ETH this morning: at 6 o'clock, it was still increasing its short position of ETH. Currently, it holds a short position of up to 70,000 ETH (approximately $252 million).Position Details: Shorting 70,000 ETH with a leverage of 15 times, worth $252 million, with an opening price of $3618 and a liquidation price of $3686, and having unrealized gains of more than $1.33 million.

item.title: 「Insider Trader」 Stops Ethereum Short, Bitcoin Short Liquidation Price at $114,491
item.description: On August 6th, according to EmberCN's monitoring, the "insider trader" @qwatio, one hour ago. In order to prevent the BTC short position from being liquidated, he liquidated the ETH short position for stop loss. Currently, he only holds a BTC short position worth $115 million, with a liquidation price at $114,491 and an unrealized profit of more than $600,000. However, the liquidation price is only $400 away from the current BTC price.

item.title: Metamask is planning to partner with Stripe to issue the stablecoin 「Metamask USD」.
item.description: On August 6th, according to a governance proposal, MetaMask intends to collaborate with Stripe to launch a stablecoin named "MetaMask USD (mmUSD)." This stablecoin will be issued by Stripe but will use the "M^0" network for off-chain issuance and settlement.This stablecoin is designed to be a core asset within the MetaMask ecosystem and will be seamlessly integrated into various MetaMask services. Currently, neither MetaMask nor Stripe has provided official confirmations, and specific details regarding the stablecoin's structure, release schedule, or regulatory aspects are limited.

item.title: Robinhood Crypto has launched ONDO and FLOKI for US users.
item.description: On August 6th, Robinhood Crypto made ONDO and FLOKI available to U.S. users in an effort to further enhance the platform's asset offerings.
